label: cascading_failure_01_ep_030
content:
## 2024-02-13 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /checkout: 153200 req | p50: 170ms p95: 480ms p99: 940ms | err: 1.96% (3000 errors) | success: 98.04%
- /fraud_check: 152800 req | p50: 150ms p95: 420ms p99: 740ms | err: 0.54% (820 errors) | success: 99.46%
- /geo_lookup: 148100 req | p50: 330ms p95: 670ms p99: 850ms | err: 0.39% (580 errors) | success: 99.61%
- /auth: 200100 req | p50: 45ms p95: 118ms p99: 225ms | err: 0.14% (280 errors) | success: 99.86%
- /product_catalog: 270500 req | p50: 60ms p95: 182ms p99: 335ms | err: 0.14% (380 errors) | success: 99.86%
- /search: 237200 req | p50: 80ms p95: 225ms p99: 400ms | err: 0.22% (520 errors) | success: 99.78%
- /recommendations: 191900 req | p50: 100ms p95: 285ms p99: 500ms | err: 0.25% (480 errors) | success: 99.75%

### Infrastructure
- gateway-01: CPU 62% | Mem 75% | Disk 63% | Conns: 5400 | Net: 665/805 Mbps
- gateway-02: CPU 60% | Mem 73% | Disk 62% | Conns: 5250 | Net: 648/782 Mbps
- service-b-01: CPU 62% | Mem 73% | Disk 61% | Conns: 5200 | Net: 590/680 Mbps
- metrics-db-01: CPU 42% | Mem 76% | Disk 88% | Conns: 395 | Net: 165/210 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- primary: active 165 | idle 95 | waiting 80 | exhaustion: 12 | max: 260 | avg_wait: 60ms
- replica: active 78 | idle 22 | waiting 18 | exhaustion: 4 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 18ms
- third_party_geo: active 72 | idle 48 | waiting 55 | exhaustion: 10 | max: 120 | avg_wait: 85ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92.3% | Bandwidth: 8.7 Gbps | Origin requests: 455900

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] SERVICE-B-RETRY-COUNT on service-b-01: retry_count=780 retry_rate_pct=0.62
- [CRITICAL] UPSTREAM-LATENCY on gateway-01: geo_lookup_p99_ms=850
- [CRITICAL] CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION on gateway-02: pool=third_party_geo events=10 waiting=55

### Deployments & Changes
- Config change: geo vendor endpoint switched to alternate host (DNS updated)

### Events
- Updated DNS to use alternate geo vendor endpoint host
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Feature flag 'skip-geo-on-timeout' set to 95% of traffic
- Post-incident review meeting scheduled 2024-02-14 17:00Z

### On-Call
- Shift: K. Okafor. 7 pages. 2 tickets (DNS-79 verify geo endpoint, PIR-12 scheduling). Status: Stabilizing.
